ClientWebPart.Name: BrightcoveVideoWebPart
ClientWebPart.Title: Brightcove Video WebPart
ClientWebPart.Description: Brightcove Web Part to embed video content onto a web part page.

Property.Name: pageServerRelativeUrl
Property.WebDisplayName: The server-relative url of the web part page

Property.Name: accountId
Property.WebDisplayName: The id of the account that contains the video content

Property.Name: playerId
Property.WebDisplayName: The id of the player to use

Property.Name: modeId
Property.WebDisplayName: The id of the video to display

Property.Name: autoplay
Property.WebDisplayName: Indicates if the video should autoplay

Property.Name: muted
Property.WebDisplayName: Indicates if the video should be muted
